text: {"answer": "H", "reasoning": "Each statement iâ€“v contains a factual error: i) Swiss Federal Supreme Court cannot annul federal statutes; ii) inherited property is indeed part of a spouse's individual property under participation; iii) the Helvetic Republic replaced, not restored, the confederate structure; iv) Moynier did not author 'Das moderne Kriegsrecht' in 1866; v) a successful constitutional challenge does not annul the law, only suspends its application in that case.
